speaker: Sabrina Kurtasio
title: Automated ML Forecasting and DNN
description:
Learn about the new features Automated Machine Learning (Automated ML) is releasing, from enhanced time-series forecasting capabilities and no-code user interface, to DNN support for text and forecasting scenarios.

00:50 What is time series forecasting?

02:50  Requirements
04:20 Demo
